iaps.Description: identifier of IAPS image presented on a given trial.

msit.Description: MSIT stimulus presented on a given trial.

valence.Description: Validated valence of the IAPS image (1 = most negative, 9 = most positive).

arousal.Description: Validated arousal of the IAPS image (1 = not at all, 9 = highly arousing).

responseKey.Description: The key pressed by the participant indicating the odd-number-out.

responseTime.Description: Response time of participant (relative to MSIT onset).

responseUncertainty.Description: Uncertainty in accuracy of response time measurement.
